salaryExpectations: LKR 70,000 (Skilled Carpenter) to LKR 180,000+ (Master Carpenter/Workshop Owner) per month.
requiredSkills: Use of hand and power tools
futureOutlook: While the industry has many informal workers, there is high demand for skilled, professional carpenters, especially for high-end interior work, custom furniture, and in the construction industry. A combination of traditional skills and proficiency with modern tools can lead to a very successful and respected career.
